Title: Great  Pictures
Pros: Canon continues to produce a superior product(I also own the A70).Takes great pictures,easy to use and it makes me look like a pro!
Comments: Buy it, you won't be disappointed.Free 1 Gig. memory card sweetened the deal.NewEgg shipped it out fast!,they are the best!

Title: Works great
Cons: Only 4x zoom lens. Only supports up to ISO 400 speed. Aperture ceiling of 2.4. For the price, however, these are things you can reasonably expect.
Pros: In all but the most inhospitable lighting conditions, the camera takes fantastic pictures. When you're in a hurry, the automatic snapshot does a great job of gaugeing the lighting conditions and making the proper adjustments for a good picture. If you're not satisfied with that, you can adjust everything manually. Noise in dark shots is generally diminutive.
Comments: A great starter camera for the budding photographer, great snapshot camera for knockaround picture-taking.

Title: Nice Camera!
Cons: little tricky to get the camera to work with the pc, have to slide a switch.
Pros: quick to pick up & takes great pics
Comments: other wise easy to use & makes nice short videos

Cons: Didn't see a way to transfer files from the camera directly, It wanted to use the camera as a Twain device (like a scanner) so the 3mb pics take of 30mb...  Work around was to just use a card reader instead of plugging camera into computer.
Pros:
Lots of features for a camera in this price range.

Ready to take a pic in ~1 sec from power-off state!  Great for moments that you would otherwise miss on cameras that take 5 seconds or so to start up.

Picture browsing on the camera is really nice you can zoom out to see a page of pics instead of 1 at a time.  Can also see a histogram to check if you may need to retake the pic.

Pic/movie playback to TV

Title: Great Camera
Pros: Fantastic camera. Excellent picture quality, movie quality is also great considering it's a still camera. I also expected the quality of sound in video mode to be much less then it is. Very easy to use, the controls are laid out very nicely. Great use of features, I can go into all the advanced features and create fantastic photography, and if my mother needs to use a camera she goes onto the auto settings and still produces a fantastic image.

Fast. Sharp. Lots of features. Reads 4GB cards. 450+ shots (and twenty 10 second video clips) later, the original 4 x AA Duracell pros are still going...

When camera is powered down, lens is covered. LCD display rotates 180 degree.
Comments: wish it came with a case.

Title: Nice camera
Pros: Nice camera, quick focus compared to my old G2.  I like to crop and reframe before printing so megapixles is important
Comments: Very nice camera for the money

Title: Great 7MP Camera!
Pros:
I'm very happy with this camera for both still pictures and the movies you can make with it!
The movie mode has many settings to choose from. The 320X240 at 60fps is nice for seeing such motions as a golf swing or for checking out your tennis forehand, backhand or serve. You can play the movie from the camera directly to your TV and at the camera stop each frame if you wish... at 60 fps you see lots of detail.
With Photoshop Elements (from 2.0 to the new 5.0, Photoshop or Paint Shop Pro) and this camera the creative things to do are limited only by your imagination! The FREE 1GB card Newegg included made this purchase an easy one to decide to make. Overall I'm very pleased!

Title: Can't go wrong for this price!
Cons: I agree with the others... the little plastic cover where the USB cable plugs in is flimsy.
Pros: Takes excellent pictures with little to no skill on the operator's part. Indoor with flash are as good as I've seen.  Outdoor without flash are spectacular. Portrait, Kids and Pets, and Foliage are all my favorite settings.
Comments: I simply wanted an excellent point and shoot to replace my film camera, and that's what I got.  Although I am not by any means an avid photographer, this camera makes me look like one. Every camera review site I perused highly recommended this camera. For the price that Newegg has it (especially when they throw in a 1 GB card!!!) you cannot find a better value!

Title: Awesome
Pros: Great Pictures.  Good image on the LCD @ night. And if you decide not to use the LCD, the "eye hole" is excellent.

Pros: Nice camera, quick focus compared to my old G2.  I like to crop and reframe before printing so megapixles is important
Comments: Very nice camera for the money

Title: Great 7MP Camera!
Pros:
I'm very happy with this camera for both still pictures and the movies you can make with it!
The movie mode has many settings to choose from. The 320X240 at 60fps is nice for seeing such motions as a golf swing or for checking out your tennis forehand, backhand or serve. You can play the movie from the camera directly to your TV and at the camera stop each frame if you wish... at 60 fps you see lots of detail.
With Photoshop Elements (from 2.0 to the new 5.0, Photoshop or Paint Shop Pro) and this camera the creative things to do are limited only by your imagination! The FREE 1GB card Newegg included made this purchase an easy one to decide to make. Overall I'm very pleased!

Title: Can't go wrong for this price!
Cons: I agree with the others... the little plastic cover where the USB cable plugs in is flimsy.
Pros: Takes excellent pictures with little to no skill on the operator's part. Indoor with flash are as good as I've seen.  Outdoor without flash are spectacular. Portrait, Kids and Pets, and Foliage are all my favorite settings.
Comments: I simply wanted an excellent point and shoot to replace my film camera, and that's what I got.  Although I am not by any means an avid photographer, this camera makes me look like one. Every camera review site I perused highly recommended this camera. For the price that Newegg has it (especially when they throw in a 1 GB card!!!) you cannot find a better value!

Title: Awesome
Pros: Great Pictures.  Good image on the LCD @ night. And if you decide not to use the LCD, the "eye hole" is excellent.

Title: Great  Pictures
Pros: Canon continues to produce a superior product(I also own the A70).Takes great pictures,easy to use and it makes me look like a pro!
Comments: Buy it, you won't be disappointed.Free 1 Gig. memory card sweetened the deal.NewEgg shipped it out fast!,they are the best!

Title: Works great
Cons: Only 4x zoom lens. Only supports up to ISO 400 speed. Aperture ceiling of 2.4. For the price, however, these are things you can reasonably expect.
Pros: In all but the most inhospitable lighting conditions, the camera takes fantastic pictures. When you're in a hurry, the automatic snapshot does a great job of gaugeing the lighting conditions and making the proper adjustments for a good picture. If you're not satisfied with that, you can adjust everything manually. Noise in dark shots is generally diminutive.
Comments: A great starter camera for the budding photographer, great snapshot camera for knockaround picture-taking.

Title: Nice Camera!
Cons: little tricky to get the camera to work with the pc, have to slide a switch.
Pros: quick to pick up & takes great pics
Comments: other wise easy to use & makes nice short videos

Cons: Didn't see a way to transfer files from the camera directly, It wanted to use the camera as a Twain device (like a scanner) so the 3mb pics take of 30mb...  Work around was to just use a card reader instead of plugging camera into computer.
Pros:
Lots of features for a camera in this price range.

Ready to take a pic in ~1 sec from power-off state!  Great for moments that you would otherwise miss on cameras that take 5 seconds or so to start up.

Picture browsing on the camera is really nice you can zoom out to see a page of pics instead of 1 at a time.  Can also see a histogram to check if you may need to retake the pic.

Pic/movie playback to TV

Title: Great Camera
Pros: Fantastic camera. Excellent picture quality, movie quality is also great considering it's a still camera. I also expected the quality of sound in video mode to be much less then it is. Very easy to use, the controls are laid out very nicely. Great use of features, I can go into all the advanced features and create fantastic photography, and if my mother needs to use a camera she goes onto the auto settings and still produces a fantastic image.

Fast. Sharp. Lots of features. Reads 4GB cards. 450+ shots (and twenty 10 second video clips) later, the original 4 x AA Duracell pros are still going...

When camera is powered down, lens is covered. LCD display rotates 180 degree.
Comments: wish it came with a case.
